metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5260 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The (1) mkxmltype and (2) mkdtskel scripts in XML-DT before 0.64 allow local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a /tmp/_xml_##### temporary file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5260` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml-dt-perl - 0.66-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> Look for 0.66-1 which fixes usability issue introduced with 0.65.

criterions.comment: libxml-dt-perl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.66-1').
